name: IOUserAudioDriver
desc: A DriverKit provider object that manages communications with an audio device.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the service.

items.name: - Start
items.desc: Starts the current service and associates it with the specified provider.

items.name: - Stop
items.desc: Stops the service associated with the specified provider.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the service.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - GetWorkQueue
items.desc: Gets the work queue created by the audio object, as a pointer to a dispatch queue.

items.name: - GetName
items.desc: Gets the name of the driver.

items.name: - SetName
items.desc: Sets the name of the driver.

items.name: - StartDevice
items.desc: Tells the driver to start I/O on an audio device or audio clock device.

items.name: - StopDevice
items.desc: Tells the driver to stop I/O on an audio device or audio clock device.

items.name: - NewUserClient
items.desc: Requests the creation of a new user client for the service.

items.name: - GetTransportType
items.desc: Gets the transport type of the driver.

items.name: - SetTransportType
items.desc: Set the transport type of the driver.

items.name: - AddObject
items.desc: Adds an audio object to the driver.

items.name: - RemoveObject
items.desc: Removes an audio object from the driver.

items.name: - GetAudioObjectForObjectID
items.desc: Gets a pointer to an audio object, given the objectâ€™s identifier.

items.name: - PropertiesChanged
items.desc: Informs the host when the state of an object in the driver changes.

items.name: - AddCustomProperty
items.desc: Adds a custom property object to the driver.

items.name: - RemoveCustomProperty
items.desc: Removes a previously-added custom property object from the driver.
